name: API

classitems.description:
We check for and fetch meta data if needed in the parent routes of Fountainhead. This lets consumers overwrite the apiNamespace if they need before we request the meta data that drives Fountainhead.

NOTE: We only fetch meta data if it isn't present yet.
classitems.name: beforeModel

classitems.description: Reset page scroll on any transition. Note that Fountainhead is inside of a fake page, so we scroll that instead of the body
classitems.name: didTransition

description: The /api route is the parent route for module and class documentation.

method.description:
We check for and fetch meta data if needed in the parent routes of Fountainhead. This lets consumers overwrite the apiNamespace if they need before we request the meta data that drives Fountainhead.

NOTE: We only fetch meta data if it isn't present yet.
method.name: beforeModel

event.description: Reset page scroll on any transition. Note that Fountainhead is inside of a fake page, so we scroll that instead of the body
event.name: didTransition
